item.title: Savannah Guthrie Is 'Dearly Missed' at Olympics amid Mother's Disappearance, NBC Commentators Say
item.description: Guthrie remains stateside as she continues looking for answers in the abduction of her mother Nancy

item.title: Meghan McCain Explains Why She Hasn't Been Sharing Photos of Her Newborn Son Ransom
item.description: "I don't mind being polarizing when it comes to my work but I don't want to subject my kids to any of the bulls---," McCain said
